channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump accuses Biden admin of 'MASSIVE SCANDAL' after new jobs numbers dramatically revised downward
item.description: Former President Trump quickly jumped on a massive downward revision by the Labor Department on new job growth, charging that the Biden-Harris administration "PADDED THE NUMBERS."

item.title: Bill Pascrell Jr., long-time New Jersey congressman, dies at 87
item.description: New Jersey Democratic Rep. Bill Pascrell Jr., a 14-term incumbent and a fixture in his hometown of Paterson for more than four decades, died Wednesday, according to a statement from his social media account. He was 87.

item.title: It’s Still the ‘Of Course’ Election
item.description: A defeat for Kamala Harris remains as easy to envision as a defeat for Donald Trump.

item.title: Push To Enshrine Taxpayer-Funded Abortion Until Birth In Montana Constitution Makes The Ballot
item.description: The proposed amendment ensures any abortion could be construed to meet the requirements for taxpayer funding under Montana Medicaid.

item.title: Bloomberg drops $10 million donation in bid to help House Democrats
item.description: Billionaire Mike Bloomberg threw $10 million behind House Democrats last month, adding to the $20 million he gave to bolster the party's White House efforts.

item.title: Crypto industry's campaign spending at record level, says watchdog report
item.description: Cryptocurrency companies are pouring an "unprecedented" amount of money into federal elections, according to a watchdog report Wednesday that says the industry accounts for nearly half of the direct corporate spending this cycle.

item.title: Kamala Harris Is Wafer Thin
item.description: Can they really make this work?

item.title: GA Attorney General Says His Office Won’t Investigate Fulton County Over Its Illegal 2020 Conduct
item.description: The SEB ruled 2-1 in May that Fulton County violated election law during the 2020 election and therefore must have an independent monitor to oversee its elections.

item.title: Democratic New Jersey Rep. Bill Pascrell Jr. dead at 87
item.description: Democratic Congressman Bill Pascrell Jr. of New Jersey passed away on Wednesday after serving 14 terms in Congress.

item.title: Walz, Clinton headline DNC's third-day appeal to 'everyday Americans'
item.description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, who turned a camouflage cap into an emblem of the Harris-Walz campaign's bid to win battleground voters, will introduce himself to the nation again Wednesday in a prime-time convention speech organizers say will highlight the "small-town values" that have shaped him.

item.title: Biden’s Dangerous Unilateral Spending Spree
item.description: No other administration has so consistently or aggressively used regulation to increase direct government spending without congressional appropriations.

item.title: There Is Something Really Demented About Tim Walz’s Lying
item.description: Weird.

item.title: Obama speech to secure border without 'tearing' kids from parents omits somber DHS report on missing migrants
item.description: Barack Obama when talking about securing the border at the DNC Tuesday omitted a new DHS report citing tens to hundreds of thousands missing migrant children.

item.title: Trump says Democratic leaders 'threatened' Biden to quit race
item.description: Former President Donald Trump says President Biden would still be running if it hadn't been for his poor debate performance and believes Democratic leaders "threatened" the president before he ceded way to Vice President Kamala Harris.

item.title: In Rob Peace, Masculine Endeavor Goes Bad
item.description: How Hollywood reduces urban tragedy to cliché.

item.title: ‘Tim Walz Reenlisted After 9/11’ Is The Latest Lie About His Military Record
item.description: Just like claims that he served in war, or retired as a command sergeant major, the story Walz tells about reenlisting is not true.

item.title: Gavin Newsom says Kamala Harris will have 'more time to articulate nuances' after the DNC
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom told Fox News' Peter Doocy on Tuesday night that Vice President Kamala Harris will have "more time" to lay out her policy positions following the Democratic National Convention.

item.title: Immigration could be the Trump card in must-win Pennsylvania
item.description: A triumphant Trump return to the White House could hinge on sealing the deal with immigration-concerned fence-sitters in crucial swing states -- including Pennsylvania, which is shaping up to be a must-win for Vice President Kamala Harris.

item.title: Governor Walz Shows How Not to Solve the Housing Crisis
item.description: Walz can’t see the contradictions in his housing policies.

item.title: Utah Files Lawsuit To Reclaim State Control Over Public Lands Locked Up By Federal Government
item.description: State officials announced their request for the Supreme Court to review the federal government's authority to hold unappropriated lands.
